text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy
author: Dalai Lama

text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated
author: Confucius

text: My mama always said, life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get
author: Forrest Gump

text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose
author: Dr. Seuss

text: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life
author: Mark Twain

text: Life’s tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The best way to predict your future is to create it
author: Abraham Lincoln
